summary: Structural shocks: 'Liberation Day' orders in the US, DeepSeek AI market crash, and confirmed climate records.

events.details: Vehicle-ramming and shooting in the French Quarter kills 15.
Santa Ana winds drive fires destroying 13,000 structures.
Magnitude 7.1 quake leaves at least 126 dead.
2024 confirmed as the first year exceeding 1.5°C warming.
Artificial womb milestone achieves mid-gestation Tasmanian tiger embryo.
Trump inaugurated; revokes 78 executive orders and withdraws from WHO/Paris Agreement.
Efficient Chinese LLM launch triggers a 17% intraday drop in Nvidia stock.
